1419B Stairs

31 Oct 2020

None


using namespace std;
using ll = unsigned long long;
using ii = pair<int, int>;
using vi = vector<int>;
using predicate = function<bool(ll)>;
ll x;
ll sq(ll n) { return (n * (n + 1)) / 2; }
int bs(ll l, ll r, predicate p)
{
    while (l < r)
    {
        ll m = l + (r - l + 1) / 2;
        if (p(m))
            l = m;
        else
            r = m - 1;
    }
    return l;
}
int main(void)
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--)
    {
        cin >> x;
        ll y = 2, ans = 0;
        while (sq(y - 1) <= x)
        {
            ans += 1;
            x -= sq(y - 1);
            y <<= 1;
        }
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
